item.title: Getting Started with Pathlib
item.description: Introduction This tutorial will guide you on how to use the Pathlib module for working with filesystem paths, the benefits, and understand the problem it solves since the Python standard library already contains os.path. How is it Better than os.path os.path was the only way to work with filesystem paths, but it had some limitations. To perform certain tasks, you have to import from other standard library modules. For instance, suppose you want to list the files ending with .
